rules_text:
Flying
When Tender Caretaker enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its toughness.
Reborn 3–{5}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with three additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
